workingFiles.commands/reflect.md: new - main command for extracting user corrections
workingFiles.setup.sh: modified - creates memory/learned/ dir and rules.json
workingFiles.hooks/session-start.sh: modified - shows rules count in status

decisions: Store rules in JSON only (memory/learned/rules.json) - not CLAUDE.md
Manual /reflect command + optional auto-reflect at checkpoint
Extract only user corrections, not inferred patterns
Rules display at session start via Phase 1.6 in /start
